description:
Ichigo and Lirin find themselves in a pinch when they are attacked by the Bount Yoshino Soma and her Doll, Goethe. An unexpected visit from Rukia comes just in the nick of time, but she and Ichigo appear to be outmatched when the Bount Ryo Udagawa and his Doll, Friede, join the fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retour de Rukia ! La renaissance de l`equipe de remplacement !
Rukia no Kikan! Daikou Team Fukkatsu
ルキアの帰還! 代行チーム復活
